tidbits.title: Diverse Landscapes
tidbits.description: Pakistan boasts diverse landscapes, from the towering peaks of the Himalayas and Karakoram to arid deserts and coastal areas along the Arabian Sea.

tidbits.title: Rich Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country has a rich cultural heritage, including historical sites like Mohenjo-Daro and diverse traditions influenced by various civilizations.

tidbits.title: Culinary Delights
tidbits.description: Pakistan offers a variety of delicious cuisines, with dishes like biryani and kebabs, reflecting a fusion of flavors from different regions.
